title: Hour 1: Mike Schur's 90s Baseball Calm App
description:
On this episode, Mike Schur joins to name more 90s baseball players, so soothingly that we move into a meditative state. Bam Adebayo talks to Cote and Witty and Heat Media Day about getting handshakes wrong and people shaped like Chris telling him to be more aggressive. Then, Hurricane Team B jumps in to lament their nickname, discuss local TV hurricane coverage, and get Stugotz's reaction to Sister Jean throwing out the first pitch at the Cubs game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
